overview: She's the talk of the Hollywood cocktail circuit... and the talk is hot! Montana Fishburne, the daughter of the acting legend and the wild girl who couldn't be tamed... caught doing the deed, every which way! From prick-teasing in a mall, to getting down in a car, to ravaging her man in a hotel room, this A-list daughter has an X-rated mind! She is nasty, dirty and filthy... she looks like a princess and acts like a porn star. Montana... it sure is hot this time of year.
title: Montana Fishburne
